body_html: I really do not understand setup.py AT ALL. On my machine it happily installs torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.h, but not in CI. It obviously has to do with the fact that it's a generated file, but it's so incredibly non-obvious where and how and when files get generated and when they get copied into what temporary install directory. It's really a pain

body: I really do not understand `setup.py` AT ALL. On my machine it happily installs `torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.h`, but not in CI. It obviously has to do with the fact that it's a generated file, but it's so incredibly non-obvious where and how and when files get generated and when they get copied into what temporary install directory. It's really a pain
